amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, requires GAO to conduct a study to assess the impact of the current micro-purchase program and the advisability of increasing the micro-purchase threshold.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 20 in part D of H. Rept. 105-544 to add a new section which requires a study on increases in micro-purchase threshold procedures.
